title: This lytell boke contaynethe certayne gostly medycynes necessary to be vsed among wel disposed people to eschewe & to auoyde the comen plage of pestilens thus collecte and sette forth in ordre by the diligent laboure of the religyous brother Syr Paule Bushe preste and Bonehome in the good house of Edyndon.
author: Bush, Paul, 1490-1558.
